*'''Subject:''' Christmas letter with updates on the Tolkien family happenings of 1970.
*'''Publication:''' None.

==Contents==
The letter includes references to:<ref name=TL/>
*The death of [[Hilary Tolkien]]'s wife Magdalen on 5 April
*Her requiem and burial perfomed by [[Edith Tolkien|Edith]] and Ronald's son [[John Tolkien|John]]
*Hilary's son Gabriel, wife and children moving from Wesham to live with him
*Edith's March fall and resultant injuries
*Pending visits from son John and daughter [[Priscilla Tolkien|Priscilla]]
*The "Canadian daughter-in-law" [[Baillie Tolkien|Baillie]] in Winnipeg
*Ronald's [[1968]] "accident" and their move to Poole
*Canada's "troubles" in 1970
*Ronald's desire to visit [[:Category:Canada|Canada]] and [[:Category:South Africa|South Africa]]
*A happy summer visit from "[[Dorothy Wood|Ding]]" â€” "an amazing person"
